stories.text: Have you found a good way to store and maintain your professional experience? Do you keep your data and view separate? Structure or unstructured data format? Have you found a "good" standard format that works for you? Any other tips you can share with HNers?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you store and maintain your CV/resume?

stories.text:
I'm working on a project which has two versions of software, a basic Open Source version, and paid with more features, and dedicated support.

I'm considering how to make all PRO features available in the free version, and don't bankrupt :) We're working full time on this project so we need to earn money.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to run a profitable open-source project?
On $600B of Y Combinator startup success

stories.text:
With Cloudflare workers able to be called single digit ms away from customers on much of the planet now, I wonder how I can keep state as close to the workers / lambdas as possible.

What are the options we have for handling state as the edge? What do you use in your business or service?
stories.title: Ask HN: Options for handling state at the edge?
